roll.type: TO AGREE TO AMENDMENT TO THE 1ST SECTION OF THE BILL (1 STAT 222, 3-3-1791), AN ACT FOR RAISING AND ADDING ANOTH- ER REGIMENT TO THE MILITARY ESTABLISHMENT OF THE U.S. AND FOR MAKING FURTHER PROVISION FOR THE PROTECTIONS OF THE FRONTIERS, WHICH AMENDMENT REDUCES THE NUMBER OF THE REGIMENT TO 608, INSTEAD OF 912 NON-COMMISSIONED OFFICERS, PRIVATES AND MUSICIANS. (P. 98-112).
roll.question: TO AGREE TO AMENDMENT TO THE 1ST SECTION OF THE BILL (1 STAT 222, 3-3-1791), AN ACT FOR RAISING AND ADDING ANOTH- ER REGIMENT TO THE MILITARY ESTABLISHMENT OF THE U.S. AND FOR MAKING FURTHER PROVISION FOR THE PROTECTIONS OF THE FRONTIERS, WHICH AMENDMENT REDUCES THE NUMBER OF THE REGIMENT TO 608, INSTEAD OF 912 NON-COMMISSIONED OFFICERS, PRIVATES AND MUSICIANS. (P. 98-112).
